SELECT t.id ,t.parent_order ,t.ref_type ,t.ref_order ,t.deal_node ,t.deal_note ,t.status ,t.operate_role ,t.operator ,t.operator_name ,t.operator_mobile ,t.start_datetime ,t.end_datetime ,t.speed_time ,t.team_code FROM tsys_biz_log t
t.${order}
SELECT count(1) FROM tsys_biz_log t INNER JOIN tsys_role_node trn ON t.deal_node = trn.node_code left join tdq_budget_order b on b.code = t.parent_order

SELECT t.id ,t.parent_order ,t.ref_type ,t.ref_order ,t.deal_node ,t.deal_note ,t.status ,t.operate_role ,t.operator ,t.operator_name ,t.operator_mobile ,t.start_datetime ,t.end_datetime ,t.speed_time ,t.team_code FROM tsys_biz_log t where t.id in (select max(id) FROM tsys_biz_log t )

SELECT a.* FROM tsys_biz_log a, (SELECT ref_order,max(end_datetime) as end_datetime FROM tsys_biz_log WHERE ref_order=#{refOrder}) b WHERE a.ref_order=b.ref_order and a.end_datetime=b.end_datetime and a.status = '1'

SELECT a.* FROM tsys_biz_log a, (SELECT ref_order,max(start_datetime) as start_datetime FROM tsys_biz_log WHERE ref_order=#{refOrder}) b WHERE a.ref_order=b.ref_order and a.start_datetime=b.start_datetime and a.status = '1' and a.deal_node = '001_02'

SELECT t.id ,t.parent_order ,t.ref_type ,t.ref_order ,t.deal_node ,t.deal_note ,t.status ,t.operate_role ,t.operator ,t.operator_name ,t.operator_mobile ,t.start_datetime ,t.end_datetime ,t.speed_time ,t.team_code FROM tsys_biz_log t WHERE t.ref_order LIKE CONCAT(#{bizOrderType},'%') GROUP BY t.ref_order
t.${order}
SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT * FROM tsys_biz_log WHERE ref_order LIKE #{bizOrderType}'%' GROUP BY ref_order) tb
